**Benefit:** When you fail a saving throw to resist possession or a *dominate* spell, you can deal 4 points of Constitution damage to yourself and reroll your saving throw as an immediate action. You cannot reduce or negate this damage in any way, and the only way to heal the damage is through natural recovery; magical methods don't work. You must take the result of the second roll, even if it is worse. If you succeed at the second saving throw, you also become immune to that spell or ability from that creature for 24 hours. You must be wielding a lethal piercing or slashing weapon, or possess a claw natural attack or some way to draw such a weapon reactively without using your immediate action, to use this ability.

exorcists_rebuttal.name: Exorcist's Rebuttal
description: ## Exorcist's Rebuttal
{SOURCE Demon Hunter's Handbook/9}
You've experienced the suffocating grip of demonic possession. The event left you emotionally scarred, but it also tempered your mind against the prying magic of evil enchantments.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Improved Iron Will}, {feat/Iron Will}.

**Benefit:** If you use your Improved Iron Will feat to reroll a Will save against a compulsion effect and successfully save against the effect, the creature that created the effect (if it originated from a creature) takes 1d4 points of Wisdom damage.

exotic_heritage.name: Exotic Heritage
description: ## Exotic Heritage
{SOURCE Ultimate Wilderness/110}
Your blood carries hints of an extraplanar ancestor, granting you a talent for a certain skill.

**Benefit:** Choose a skill. You gain a +2 bonus on skill checks with that skill. If you have 10 or more ranks in the chosen skill, this bonus increases to +4. This bonus does not stack with that granted by Skill Focus. This feat counts as Skill Focus with the chosen skill for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of the {feat/Eldritch Heritage} feat. When you select Eldritch Heritage, if you use this feat as a prerequisite, you can choose a mutated version of your chosen {ability/sorcerer_<bloodline>s} as though you were a sorcerer with a wildblooded bloodline. All other restrictions and requirements of Eldritch Heritage still apply.

exotic_weapon_proficiency.name: Exotic Weapon Proficiency
description: ## Exotic Weapon Proficiency (Combat)
{SOURCE PRPG Core Rulebook/123}

Choose one type of exotic weapon, such as the {eq-weapon/spiked chain} or {eq-weapon/whip}. You understand how to use that type of exotic weapon in combat, and can utilize any special tricks or qualities that exotic weapon might allow.
**Prerequisites:** Base attack bonus +1.
**Benefit:** You make attack rolls with the weapon normally.
**Normal:** A character who uses a weapon with which he is not proficient takes a -4 penalty on attack rolls.
**Special:** You can gain Exotic Weapon Proficiency multiple times. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new type of exotic weapon.

expanded_arcana.name: Expanded Arcana
description: ## Expanded Arcana
{SOURCE Advanced Player's Guide/159}
Your research has revealed new spells.
**Prerequisites:** Caster level 1st, see Special.

**Benefit:** Add one spell from your class's spell list to your list of spells known. This is in addition to the number of spells normally gained at each new level in your class. You may instead add two spells from your class's spell list to your list of spells known, but both of these spells must be at least one level lower than the highest level spell you can cast in that class. Once made, these choices cannot be changed.
**Special:** You can only take this feat if you possess levels in a class whose spellcasting relies on a limited list of spells known, such as the bard, oracle, and sorcerer.
You can gain Expanded Arcana multiple times.

expanded_enhance_arrows.name: Expanded Enhance Arrows
description: ## Expanded Enhance Arrows
{SOURCE Chronicle of Legends/8}
Your magical arrows produce a wider range of powers.
**Prerequisites:** Enhance arrows class feature.

**Benefit:** You add {magic-enh/corrosive} to the list of special properties you can grant your nonmagical arrows with your enhance arrows ability at 3rd level. At 5th level, you can add the {magic-enh/ghost touch}, {magic-enh/limning}, or {magic-enh/planar} special ability instead of {magic-enh/distance}. At 7th level, you can add the {magic-enh/corrosive burst} special ability.

expanded_fiendish_resistance.name: Expanded Fiendish Resistance
description: ## Expanded Fiendish Resistance
{SOURCE Advanced Race Guide/174}
You gain extra fiendish resistances.
**Prerequisites:** {race/Tiefling}.
**Benefit:** Pick one of the following energy types that you do not already have resistance to: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. You gain resistance 5 to that energy type.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, pick another energy type you do not have resistance to. You gain resistance 5 to that energy type.

expanded_hunter_tactics.name: Expanded Hunter Tactics
description: ## Expanded Hunter Tactics (Combat)
{SOURCE Monster Hunter's Handbook/5}
You're able to train your allies as you do your animal companion.
**Prerequisites:** Hunter tactics class feature.

**Benefit:** As a move action, you can grant a teamwork feat you know to a single ally within 30 feet who can see and hear you. The selected ally gains the benefits of this bonus feat for 1 round plus 1 additional round for every 2 character levels you have, but only while the ally is adjacent to you or your {ability/animal companion}. A given ally can benefit from this feat only once per day.

expanded_metakinesis.name: Expanded Metakinesis
description: ## Expanded Metakinesis
{SOURCE Magic Tactics Toolbox/9}
You can augment the destructive force of your kinetic blast in new ways.
**Prerequisites:** Kinetic blast class feature, metakinesis class feature.

**Benefit:** Select one of the following metamagic feats: {feat/Disruptive Spell}, {feat/Ectoplasmic Spell}, {feat/Furious Spell}, {feat/Merciful Spell}, or {feat/Piercing Spell}. By accepting 1 point of burn, you can alter your kinetic blast as if using the selected metamagic feat.
**Special:** This feat can be chosen multiple times. Each time, you select a different metamagic feat.

expanded_phrenic_pool.name: Expanded Phrenic Pool
description: ## Expanded Phrenic Pool
{SOURCE Occult Adventures/133}
Your reservoir of mental energy is greater than normal.
**Prerequisites:** Phrenic pool class feature.
**Benefit:** Your phrenic pool total increases by 2 points.

expanded_preparation.name: Expanded Preparation
description: ## Expanded Preparation
{SOURCE Advanced Class Guide/146}
You can prepare more spells than other arcanists can.
**Prerequisites:** Arcanist level 1st.

**Benefit:** You gain an {main/extra |spell>s_arcanist} prepared of the highest level you can currently cast as an {class/arcanist} when selecting this feat. This is in addition to the number of spells you can normally prepare from your spellbook. You can instead add two spells prepared, but both of these spells must be at least 1 level lower than the highest-level spell you can currently cast as an arcanist when selecting this feat. You must choose which benefit you gain when you take this feat, and the extra spells prepared do not change level when you gain access to higher-level spells.
**Special:** You can take this feat up to three times. Each time you do, you can choose either benefit.

expanded_resistance.name: Expanded Resistance
description: ## Expanded Resistance
{SOURCE Advanced Race Guide/37}
You have expanded your natural resistance to magic to encompass different kinds of magic.
**Prerequisites:** {race/Gnome}, illusion resistance racial trait.
**Benefit:** Select one school of magic other than illusion. You gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against spells or effects from the selected school.
**Special:** You may select this feat more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time you select it, it applies to a different school of magic.

expanded_spell_kenning.name: Expanded Spell Kenning
description: ## Expanded Spell Kenning
{SOURCE Advanced Class Origins/26}
You are learned in a broader range of spell traditions than most.
**Prerequisites:** Spell kenning class feature.
**Benefit:** When you use your spell kenning class feature, you can select a spell from either the {main/spells_<druid} or the {main/spells_<witch} spell list.

expanded_studies.name: Expanded Studies
description: ## Expanded Studies
{SOURCE Advanced Class Origins/26}
You're part of a group or organization with access to greater magical mysteries than you understand yourself, and you have learned from your colleagues' eldritch expertise.
**Prerequisites:** Wis 17, {class/hunter} or {class/warpriest} level 16th.

**Benefit:** You add 7th-level spells to your spell list for purposes of using spell completion and spell trigger magic items. If you're a hunter, you add 7th-level druid spells to your list. If you're a warpriest, you add 7th-level cleric spells to your list. This doesn't give you the ability to cast spells of this level, only to act as though your spell list included them when using appropriate magic items.

For example, a 16th-level hunter has access to druid spells of only 1st to 6th levels. Thus, the hunter can't use spell completion or spell trigger magic items of druid spells of 7th level or higher without succeeding at a Use Magic Device check. If the hunter takes Expanded Studies, she doesn't gain the ability to cast 7th-level druid spells, but she could use a scroll of {spell/heal} or a wand of {spell/summon nature's ally VII} without needing to attempt a Use Magic Device check.

expanded_summon_monster.name: Expanded Summon Monster
description: ## Expanded Summon Monster
{SOURCE Monster Summoner's Handbook/28}
You can summon allies beyond the reach of most conjurers.
**Prerequisites:** Ability to cast a {spell/summon monster>_1} spell.

**Benefit:** For each spell level 1-9, select two creatures from the table below. You then add these creatures to the summon monster table of the same level, allowing you to summon them with the appropriate summon monster spell. Once made, these choices can't be changed.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you can select two more monsters from the table below to add to the summon monster table of the same level.
::h3[1st Level]{jl}
- {monster/Antelope}[^T]
- {monster/Baboon}[^T]

- {monster/greater_<Host devil}
- {monster/Hypnalis}
- {monster/Iguanodon}[^T]

- {monster/Valkyrie}

[^T]: This creature is summoned with the {template/celestial} template if you are good and the {template/fiendish} template if you are evil. If you are neutral, you can choose which template to apply to the creature. This summoned creature has an alignment that matches yours, regardless of its usual alignment. Summoning this creature makes the summoning spell's type match your alignment.

expansive_trap_ability.name: Expansive Trap Ability
description: ## Expansive Trap Ability
{SOURCE Ranged Tactics Toolbox/14}
Your ranger traps and land mines occupy a larger area.
**Prerequisites:** Ability to use {ability/ranger traps} or [land mines](arc-alchemist/trap_breaker).

**Benefit:** You can designate any ranger trap or land mine you lay to occupy up to 4 contiguous squares of your choice. When the trap is activated, the effect is centered on whichever square the triggering creature first entered. If more than one square is entered simultaneously, choose at random.

expeditious_sleuth.name: Expeditious Sleuth
description: ## Expeditious Sleuth
{SOURCE Ultimate Intrigue/82}
You mind is meticulous and sharp, making it easy for you to thoroughly search an area.
**Prerequisites:** Perception 3 ranks, inspiration or lore master class feature.
**Benefit:** You can take 20 on a Perception check in only 10 times the usual amount of time, and gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks when you take 20.
**Normal:** It takes 20 times as long to take 20 on a skill check.

experienced_ghost_hunter.name: Experienced Ghost Hunter
description: ## Experienced Ghost Hunter
{SOURCE Plane-Hopper's Handbook/16}
You've fought enough specters that doing so has become second nature.
**Prerequisites:** Character level 7th, {race/duskwalker}, ghost hunter racial trait.
**Benefit:** You can use your ghost hunter ability to grant your weapons the {magic-enh/ghost touch} special ability as a swift action. You can activate ghost hunter an additional time each day.

experienced_vagabond.name: Experienced Vagabond
description: ## Experienced Vagabond
{SOURCE Taldor, Echoes of Glory/28}
You spent significant time as a vagabond and know your way around their society.
**Prerequisites:** Bluff 2 ranks, Knowledge (local) 2 ranks, member of an underclass.

**Benefit:** When dealing with criminals, vagabonds, unsavory characters, or other members of a country's underclass, you gain a +1 bonus on Bluff, Diplomacy, Knowledge (local), and Sense Motive checks. When traveling with at least one other person who has this feat, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on Perception checks to avoid being surprised at the start of combat.

experimental_spellcaster.name: Experimental Spellcaster
description: ## Experimental Spellcaster (Words of Power)
{SOURCE Ultimate Magic/166}
Despite casting spells, you dabble in the art of wordcasting.
**Prerequisites:** Ability to cast spells.

**Benefit:** Select one class that grants you the ability to cast spells. You can now use the slots from that class to cast a limited number of {rule/words of power} spells. Add all of the target words to your spell list and your spellbook, familiar, or list of spells known. In addition, add the boost meta word and one effect word of any level you can cast in the chosen class.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Each additional time you select this feat, add two effect or meta words to your spellbook, familiar, or list of spells known.

expert_boarder.name: Expert Boarder
description: ## Expert Boarder
{SOURCE Adventurer's Guide/76;Andoran, Birthplace of Freedom/32}
You are as comfortable dangling from a ship's rigging as you are on stable land.
**Prerequisites:** Affiliated with the Gray Corsairs.

**Benefit:** Acrobatics and Climb are class skills for you. You gain a +2 bonus on Acrobatics and Climb checks to climb or swing on a rope or ship's rigging. You do not provoke attacks of opportunity from climbing or swinging on a rope or ship's rigging.

expert_cartographer.name: Expert Cartographer
description: ## Expert Cartographer
{SOURCE Ultimate Wilderness/110}
You are skilled at drawing quality maps, making your cartographic works both more useful and more valuable when sold.
**Prerequisites:** Craft (maps) 3 ranks.

**Benefit:** You gain a +4 bonus on Craft (maps) checks when creating a map, as well as 1 additional {rule/Discovery /Point>and_exploration}. If you succeed at the check by 5 or more, the list price of the map increases by 20%.

expert_driver.name: Expert Driver
description: ## Expert Driver
{SOURCE Ultimate Combat/100}
When {rule/driving [a chosen type of ]vehicle>s}, you exhibit incredible control, maneuvering the vehicle with greater ease and stopping with uncanny precision.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Skilled Driver} with the selected vehicle type.

**Benefit:** You can make an accelerate, decelerate, or turn action as a move action instead of a standard action. Furthermore, when stopping a vehicle, you subtract 10 feet from the roll to determine how many feet the vehicle moves forward before it stops.

expert_explorer.name: Expert Explorer
description: ## Expert Explorer
{SOURCE Ultimate Wilderness/110}
You are trained to seek out the unknown places of the wild and can explore more efficiently than your untrained rivals.
**Prerequisites:** Knowledge (nature) or Survival 5 ranks.

**Benefit:** You gain a +2 bonus on skill checks when using the {rule/discovery_and_<exploration} rules. If you succeed at such a skill check by 5 or more, you gain an additional 1d4 Discovery Points.

expert_salvager.name: Expert Salvager
description: ## Expert Salvager
{SOURCE Ultimate Wilderness/111}
You are adept at {rule/foraging} and {rule/salvaging} raw materials from even the most seemingly sparse of environments.
**Prerequisites:** Craft (any) 2 ranks, Spellcraft 2 ranks.

**Benefit:** You gain a +4 bonus on Craft checks for Craft skills in which you have at least 2 ranks and Spellcraft checks when crafting items by foraging alchemical supplies and material components, salvaging raw crafting materials, and salvaging raw magical item materials.

expert_sniper.name: Expert Sniper
description: ## Expert Sniper (Combat)
{SOURCE Dirty Tactics Toolbox/10}
Your quick ranged attacks make you difficult to locate.
**Prerequisites:** Stealth 3 ranks.
**Benefit:** You reduce the penalty on your Stealth checks to stay hidden while {skill/sniping} by 10.
**Normal:** You take a -20 penalty on Stealth checks to stay hidden while sniping.

expert_trainer.name: Expert Trainer
description: ## Expert Trainer
{SOURCE Quests and Campaigns/26}
You have a special knack for a certain profession and take to it with ease.

**Benefit:** Choose three character classes. For the purposes of {rule/retraining}, you are always considered to have a retraining synergy with these classes, regardless of your current class. Additionally, retraining any class option takes you half the time it normally would (and thus half the gp cost), though retraining a class still takes the normal amount of time (5 days for a class with which you have synergy, 7 for a class with which you don't). If you take this feat via retraining or replace it with another feat in the same manner, the retraining time takes twice as long as normal in regards to this feat only.

exploit_lore.name: Exploit Lore
description: ## Exploit Lore
{SOURCE Ultimate Magic/149}
You can use your knowledge of a creature's weaknesses to deliver a driving and relentless assault against it.
**Prerequisites:** Monster lore class feature, base attack bonus +11.

**Benefit:** Once per day, when you successfully identify all abilities and weaknesses of a creature using the appropriate Knowledge check, you gain a +2 bonus on attack and damage rolls against that creature for 1 minute. If you identify the abilities and weaknesses of numerous creatures, you must pick one creature to be the target of this effect.

explorer.name: Explorer
description: ## Explorer (Story)
{SOURCE Quests and Campaigns/10}
You dream of discovering new vistas.
**Prerequisites:** You must have crossed at least 30 miles of wilderness without map or guide.

**Benefit:** You can provide twice as much food and water for other people when attempting a {skill/Survival} check to get along in the wild. In addition, you gain a +2 bonus on all {skill/Knowledge (geography)} checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in Knowledge (geography), increase your bonus to +4.

**Goal:** Cross through a dangerous place without a map or a guide knowledgeable about the area, stopping for no longer than 16 hours at a time, and along the way overcome an appropriate number of natural hazards, obstacles, and/or enemies, at least one of which must qualify as a challenging foe.

**Completion Benefit:** You and one ally per 3 ranks of Survival can move overland without being slowed by difficult terrain (allies must remain within 30 feet of you to be affected). Once per day, you can make a preternaturally accurate estimate regarding your path, as if you had cast {spell/find the path} on yourself (caster level equals your character level).
*Suggested Traits:* {trait/Grim Optimism}, {trait/Resilient}, {trait/Wanderlust}.
### Possible Explorer Quests
| d8 | Quest |
| 1 | Ulfen explorers point you toward the impossibly wild forests of distant Arcadia to sate your wanderlust. |
| 2 | You've resolved to dive into sunken Azlanti ruins to locate several minor artifacts, said to be scattered throughout the area according to the research of an interested faction. |
| 3 | For years the mysterious Doorway to the Red Star has befuddled scholars and inspired fringe faiths among the denizens of the Mwangi. You've decided to set out and discover why. |

| 4 | The government of a nearby nation is interested in reopening steady trade across the Crown of the World by a route north of Icerift Castle in Mendev, and they've assigned you to clear the path. |
| 5 | You hire on with a band of skilled pirates in the Shackles in hopes of being able to navigate the perilous Eye of Abendego. |
| 6 | Earthnavel in the Realm of the Mammoth Lords is said to lead into a time-lost underworld known as Deep Tolguth - a rumor whose veracity you're willing to test. |
| 7 | Forgotten Iobarian ruins in the plague-emptied forests of Casmaron await a hearty explorer to plumb their darkest depths. |
| 8 | You know that many would pay grand sums for the exotic reagents of the Valashmai Jungle in Tian Xia if it were ever opened up to trade with the Inner Sea region. |

explosive_escape.name: Explosive Escape
description: ## Explosive Escape (Combat)
{SOURCE Melee Tactics Toolbox/14}
When you break a grapple, you can send your assailants flying away from you.
**Prerequisites:** Dex 13, Str 13, {feat/Improved Grapple}, {feat/Improved Unarmed Strike}.

**Benefit:** When you succeed at a combat maneuver check to break a grapple, you can choose to throw back any enemies participating in the grapple who are up to one size category larger than you. Such foes are thrown 5 feet directly away from you and take an amount of nonlethal damage equal to that of your unarmed attack.

explosive_weapon.name: Explosive Weapon
description: ## Explosive Weapon (Combat)
{SOURCE Chronicle of Legends/8}
You can channel magical power through your weapon to devastating effect.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Arcing Weapon}.

As a standard action, you can cast a spell with an area of effect and a duration of instantaneous, such as {spell/fireball}, and release it through your melee weapon as part of a melee attack. This functions as the {class/magus} spellstrike ability, except the spell damage does not multiply on a critical hit, the spell effect is centered on you, and you are excluded from its effects.

expressionless.name: Expressionless
description: ## Expressionless
{SOURCE Heroes of Golarion/6}
Other races have difficulty reading your wooden features.
**Prerequisites:** {race/Wyrwood}.

**Benefit:** Your lack of emotion make it difficult for non-wyrwoods to relate to you. When dealing with any race other than your own, you gain a +2 bonus on Bluff checks. In addition, creatures of other races take a -2 penalty on Diplomacy and Sense Motive checks attempted against you.

exquisite_sneak.name: Exquisite Sneak
description: ## Exquisite Sneak
{SOURCE Ultimate Intrigue/82}
You know how to move silently even while wearing some forms of armor.
**Prerequisites:** Dex 15, {feat/Careful Sneak}, Stealth 6 ranks.
**Benefit:** You do not apply the armor check penalty for light and medium armor on Stealth skill checks no matter how fast you move. You still cannot use {skill/Stealth} while running or charging.

exsanguinate.name: Exsanguinate
description: ## Exsanguinate (Combat)
{SOURCE Horror Adventures/87}
You drink blood from the living at a furious rate, often draining creatures dry in a matter of seconds.
**Prerequisites:** {umr/Blood drain} universal monster ability, {umr/grab} universal monster ability.
**Benefit:** Once per round, when you successfully pin an opponent, that opponent takes double the normal damage from your blood drain.

extend_resonant_power.name: Extend Resonant Power
description: ## Extend Resonant Power
{SOURCE Occult Adventures/133}
You can share the benefits of your resonant focus powers with nearby allies.
**Prerequisites:** Caster level 7th, mental focus class feature.

**Benefit:** Select an {ability/implement/ school>s}. When you place mental focus points into an implement of that school, you can choose to gain benefits from the resonant power as if you had placed only half as many points of mental focus into the implement. If you do, you can extend the same benefits to one additional ally within 30 feet at the time you invest mental focus. If the ally moves outside of the extended power's range, the power is suppressed, but it resumes functioning once the ally moves within range again. You can spend 1 point of mental focus from your implement to pass the effect to a new target, so long as both the original target and the new one are within 30 feet. This feat can affect only one implement from a given school at a time, even if you have selected the same implement school more than once.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you take the feat, select a different implement school.

extend_spell.name: Extend Spell
description: ## Extend Spell (Metamagic)
{SOURCE PRPG Core Rulebook/123}
You can make your spells last twice as long.

**Benefit:** An extended spell lasts twice as long as normal. A spell with a duration of concentration, instantaneous, or permanent is not affected by this feat. An extended spell uses up a spell slot one level higher than the spell's actual level.

extend_the_bulwark.name: Extend the Bulwark
description: ## Extend the Bulwark (Combat, Teamwork)
{SOURCE Magical Marketplace/6}
You can bolster a trained ally's defenses by interposing your own armored body.

**Benefit:** If you are wearing medium or heavy armor and are adjacent to an ally who also has this feat, as a free action, you may give your ally a circumstance bonus to her AC equal to half the armor bonus provided by your armor. This bonus lasts for 1 round. During this round, you gain no bonus to your AC from your armor.
>**Combat Trick** (from the {feat/Combat Stamina} feat)
>{SOURCE Armor Master's Handbook/20}
>You can spend 5 stamina points either to use this feat without losing your own armor bonus to AC, or to use this feat to grant the bonus to an ally.

extended_animal_focus.name: Extended Animal Focus
description: ## Extended Animal Focus
{SOURCE Ultimate Wilderness/111;Advanced Class Guide/146}
You can assume the aspects of an animal for longer stretches of time than most of your rivals and allies.
**Prerequisites:** Animal focus class feature.
**Benefit:** Add your Wisdom bonus (minimum 1) to the number of minutes per day that you can use your {ability/animal focus} ability to assume the aspects of an animal.

extended_aspects.name: Extended Aspects
description: ## Extended Aspects
{SOURCE Ultimate Wilderness/111}
You can invoke your aspect's minor form longer than most.
**Prerequisites:** Shifter aspect class feature.
**Benefit:** Add your Wisdom bonus (minimum 1) to the number of minutes per day that you can use your shifter {ability/aspect>s} ability to assume a minor form.

extended_bane.name: Extended Bane
description: ## Extended Bane
{SOURCE Ultimate Magic/150}
Your dedication knows no limit. Your wrath dies hard.
**Prerequisites:** Bane class feature.
**Benefit:** Add your Wisdom bonus to the number of rounds per day that you can use your bane ability.

extended_combat_meditation.name: Extended Combat Meditation
description: ## Extended Combat Meditation (Combat, Meditation)
{SOURCE Blood of the Beast/28}
You are able to glean insight from your momentary meditation for longer than most can.
**Prerequisites:** Wis 13, {feat/Combat Meditation}, {feat/Meditation Master}, character level 9th.
**Benefit:** Add your Wisdom bonus (if any) to the number of rounds that you gain the benefits of your meditation feats when using Combat Meditation.

extended_scrying.name: Extended Scrying
description: ## Extended Scrying
{SOURCE Path of the Hellknight/21}
Your scrying spells last longer.
**Prerequisites:** Ability to cast a spell of the {spelldef/scrying} subschool.

**Benefit:** Any scrying spell you cast lasts twice as long as normal, as if it were cast as an extended spell with the {feat/Extend Spell} metamagic feat. Additionally, when you cast a scrying spell with a casting time of 10 minutes or longer, that casting time is halved.

extended_stare.name: Extended Stare
description: ## Extended Stare
{SOURCE Occult Adventures/133}
Your hypnotic stare has greater reach than normal.
**Prerequisites:** Hypnotic stare class feature.
**Benefit:** The range of your hypnotic stare increases by 10 feet.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.

extra_amplification.name: Extra Amplification
description: ## Extra Amplification
{SOURCE Occult Adventures/133}
You are a master at manipulating your mental energies to produce amplified effects.
**Prerequisites:** Phrenic amplification class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain one additional {ability/phrenic amplification>s}. This can't be a major amplification.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another phrenic amplification.

extra_arcana.name: Extra Arcana
description: ## Extra Arcana
{SOURCE Ultimate Magic/149}
You have unlocked the secret of a new magus arcana.
**Prerequisites:** Magus arcana class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain one additional {ability/magus arcana}. You must meet all the prerequisites for this magus arcana.
**Special:** You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects stack, granting a new arcana each time you gain this feat.

extra_arcane_pool.name: Extra Arcane Pool
description: ## Extra Arcane Pool
{SOURCE Ultimate Magic/150}
You have learned how to draw more power from your arcane pool.
**Prerequisites:** Arcane pool class feature.
**Benefit:** Your arcane pool increases by 2.
**Special:** You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects stack, granting you an increase to your arcane pool each time you take this feat.

extra_arcanist_exploit.name: Extra Arcanist Exploit
description: ## Extra Arcanist Exploit
{SOURCE Advanced Class Guide/146}
Your repertoire of arcanist exploits expands.
**Prerequisites:** Arcanist exploit class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain one additional arcanist {ability/exploit>s}. You must meet the prerequisites for this arcanist exploit.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another arcanist exploit.

extra_bane.name: Extra Bane
description: ## Extra Bane
{SOURCE Ultimate Combat/100}
You can use your bane ability more often than normal.
**Prerequisites:** Bane class feature.
**Benefit:** You can use your bane ability for 3 additional rounds per day.

extra_blood_hex.name: Extra Blood Hex
description: ## Extra Blood Hex
{SOURCE Magic Tactics Toolbox/29}
Your ties to blood hexes are much stronger than those of most other practitioners.
**Prerequisites:** Int 15, two or more blood hex feats, Spellcraft 5 ranks, Use Magic Device 5 ranks.
**Benefit:** You can use {main/feats_<blood hex/es} two additional times per day.

**Special:** You can take this feat more than once. Each time you do, you can use blood hexes two additional times per day. A character with this feat who takes levels in shaman or witch can immediately replace this feat with any blood hex feat for which she meets the prerequisites.

extra_bombs.name: Extra Bombs
description: ## Extra Bombs
{SOURCE Advanced Player's Guide/159}
You can throw more bombs per day.
**Prerequisites:** Bomb class feature.
**Benefit:** You can throw two additional bombs per day.
**Special:** You can gain Extra Bombs multiple times. Its effects stack.

extra_cantrips_or_orisons.name: Extra Cantrips or Orisons
description: ## Extra Cantrips or Orisons
{SOURCE Ultimate Magic/150}
You are a master of minor spells.
**Prerequisites:** Ability to cast cantrips or orisons.
**Benefit:** Add two cantrips to your cantrips known or two orisons to your orisons known.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, add two cantrips or orisons to your spells known.

extra_channel.name: Extra Channel
description: ## Extra Channel
{SOURCE Advanced Class Guide/146;PRPG Core Rulebook/123}
You can channel divine energy more often.
**Prerequisites:** {ability/Channel energy} class feature.
**Benefit:** You can channel energy two additional times per day.

**Special:** If a paladin with the ability to channel positive energy takes this feat, she can use {ability/lay on hands} four additional times per day, but only to channel positive energy. If a warpriest with the ability to channel energy takes this feat, he gains four additional uses of fervor per day, but can use them only to channel energy.

extra_contingency.name: Extra Contingency
description: ## Extra Contingency
{SOURCE Ultimate Intrigue/82}
You can manage multiple contingency effects.
**Prerequisites:** Character level 19th.
**Benefit:** You can have two {spell/contingency} effects active at one time. If they would both trigger on the same round, one (chosen randomly) does not trigger until 1 round later.
**Normal:** You can benefit from only a single contingency active at a time.

extra_croaking.name: Extra Croaking
description: ## Extra Croaking
{SOURCE Monster Codex/8}
Your vocal chords are especially tough and allow you to croak more often.
**Prerequisites:** {monster/Boggard}, terrifying croak.
**Benefit:** You gain one extra use of terrifying croak per hour. If your recharge time is less than 1 hour, you instead gain an extra use each time the ability recharges.

extra_crystalline_dust.name: Extra Crystalline Dust
description: ## Extra Crystalline Dust
{SOURCE Plane-Hopper's Handbook/15}
You can manifest crystalline dust more often.
**Prerequisites:** {race/Aphorite}, crystalline dust racial trait.
**Benefit:** You can use your crystalline dust ability 3 additional rounds per day.
**Special:** You can select Extra Crystalline Dust up to two additional times. Its effects stack.

extra_death_vow.name: Extra Death Vow
description: ## Extra Death Vow
{SOURCE Pathfinder Worldscape #1/28}
Your fury and fighting prowess allow you to swear to slay more enemies per day.
**Prerequisites:** Death vow class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain two additional uses of death vow per day.

extra_discovery.name: Extra Discovery
description: ## Extra Discovery
{SOURCE Advanced Player's Guide/160}
You have made a new alchemical discovery.
**Prerequisites:** Discovery class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain one additional {ability/discovery}. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this discovery.
**Special:** You can gain Extra Discovery multiple times.

extra_elemental_assault.name: Extra Elemental Assault
description: ## Extra Elemental Assault
{SOURCE Advanced Race Guide/203}
You have unlocked greater elemental power.
**Prerequisites:** {race/Suli}.
**Benefit:** Your elemental assault ability lasts an additional 2 rounds per day.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.

extra_evolution.name: Extra Evolution
description: ## Extra Evolution
{SOURCE Ultimate Magic/150}
Your eidolon has more evolutions.
**Prerequisites:** Eidolon class feature.
**Benefit:** Your eidolon's evolution pool increases by 1.
**Special:** This evolution can be taken once at 1st level, and again at 5th, 10th, 15th and 20th.

extra_feature.name: Extra Feature
description: ## Extra Feature
{SOURCE Blood of the Moon/7}
You are an exceptional shapechanger.
**Prerequisites:** Con 13, {race/skinwalker}.
**Benefit:** When you change shape to your bestial form, you may choose one additional feature from those listed in your shapechange ability and gain that benefit while in bestial form.
**Special:** You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.

extra_focus_power.name: Extra Focus Power
description: ## Extra Focus Power
{SOURCE Occult Adventures/133}
You gain an additional focus power from your implements.
**Prerequisites:** Focus power class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain one additional focus power from among those available from your chosen {ability/implement[ school]s}. You must select a power for which you normally qualify.

**Special:** You can choose this feat once for every implement school you know, up to a maximum of seven times at 18th level. Each time you do, you must choose a different focus power. If you have selected the same implement school more than once, you can select a focus power from that school once for each time you selected that school.

extra_gnome_magic.name: Extra Gnome Magic
description: ## Extra Gnome Magic
{SOURCE Gnomes of Golarion/26}
The raw magic that flows through your gnome blood is stronger than normal.
**Prerequisites:** Cha 13, {race/Gnome}.

**Benefit:** You gain an additional three uses per day of your gnome spell-like abilities ({spell/dancing lights}, {spell/ghost sound}, {spell/prestidigitation}). You can use these in any combination; for example, you can use *dancing lights* four times in one day (taking all three additional uses for the same spell), or you can cast *ghost sound* twice, *prestidigitation* twice, {spell/speak with animals} twice, and *dancing lights* once. If you have a feat, trait, or other ability that changes your racial 0-level spell-like abilities to other 0-level spells, this feat applies to them instead.

extra_grit.name: Extra Grit
description: ## Extra Grit (Grit)
{SOURCE Ultimate Combat/100}
You have more grit than the ordinary gunslinger.
**Prerequisites:** Grit class feature or the {feat/Amateur Gunslinger} feat.
**Benefit:** You gain 2 extra grit points at the start of each day, and your maximum grit increases by 2.

**Normal:** If you are a {class/gunslinger}, you gain your Wisdom modifier in grit points at the start of each day, which is also your maximum grit. If you have the Amateur Gunslinger feat, you gain 1 grit point at the start of each day, and your maximum grit is equal to your Wisdom modifier.
**Special:** If you possess levels in the gunslinger class, you can take this feat multiple times.

extra_hail_of_arrows.name: Extra Hail of Arrows
description: ## Extra Hail of Arrows (Combat)
{SOURCE Chronicle of Legends/9}
You are a master at raining arrows upon your foes.
**Prerequisites:** Hail of arrows class feature.
**Benefit:** You can use your hail of arrows ability one additional time per day.
**Special:** You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you take the feat, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

extra_hex.name: Extra Hex
description: ## Extra Hex
{SOURCE Advanced Class Guide/147;Advanced Player's Guide/160}
You have learned the secrets of a new hex.
**Prerequisites:** Hex class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain one additional hex. You must meet the prerequisites for this hex. If you are a shaman, it must be a hex granted by your spirit rather than one from a wandering spirit.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another hex.

extra_impromptu_sneak_attack.name: Extra Impromptu Sneak Attack
description: ## Extra Impromptu Sneak Attack (Combat)
{SOURCE Dirty Tactics Toolbox/10}
You are particularly adept at striking at your opponents who are unaware of your presence.
**Prerequisites:** Impromptu sneak attack class feature.
**Benefit:** You can perform one additional impromptu sneak attack each day.
**Special:** You can gain this feat multiple times. Its benefits stack.

extra_inspiration.name: Extra Inspiration
description: ## Extra Inspiration
{SOURCE Advanced Class Guide/147}
You are more able to draw upon inspiration than most.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Amateur Investigator} or inspiration class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain three extra use per day of inspiration in your inspiration pool.
**Special:** If you have levels in the {class/investigator} class, you can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain three extra uses of inspiration per day.

extra_investigator_talent.name: Extra Investigator Talent
description: ## Extra Investigator Talent
{SOURCE Advanced Class Guide/147}
You learn a new way to use your training and inspiration.
**Prerequisites:** Investigator talent class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain one additional {ability/investigator talent}. You must meet the prerequisites for this investigator talent.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another investigator talent.

extra_investiture_points.name: Extra Investiture Points
description: ## Extra Investiture Points
{SOURCE Heroes of the High Court/23}
Whatever power has invested you to guide your destiny has instilled you with additional energy.
**Prerequisites:** Investiture class feature.
**Benefit:** Your investiture points increase by 2.
**Special:** You can take Extra Investiture Points multiple times. The effects stack.

extra_item_slot.name: Extra Item Slot
description: ## Extra Item Slot
{SOURCE Animal Archive/18}
You are able to wear magic items more easily than other creatures of your kind.
**Prerequisites:** Non-humanoid body shape.
**Benefit:** Choose one magic item slot not normally available to creatures with your shape. You can now use magic items in that slot.

extra_ki.name: Extra Ki
description: ## Extra Ki
{SOURCE PRPG Core Rulebook/123}
You can use your ki pool more times per day than most.
**Prerequisites:** Ki pool class feature.
**Benefit:** Your ki pool increases by 2.
**Special:** You can gain Extra Ki multiple times. Its effects stack.

extra_lay_on_hands.name: Extra Lay on Hands
description: ## Extra Lay on Hands
{SOURCE PRPG Core Rulebook/124}
You can use your lay on hands ability more often.
**Prerequisites:** {ability/Lay on hands} class feature.
**Benefit:** You can use your lay on hands ability two additional times per day.
**Special:** You can gain Extra Lay On Hands multiple times. Its effects stack.

extra_light_and_dark.name: Extra Light and Dark
description: ## Extra Light and Dark
{SOURCE Blood of Shadows/11}
You can twist the effects of positive and negative energy for longer periods of time.
**Prerequisites:** Light and dark racial trait, {race/wayang}.
**Benefit:** Your light and dark ability lasts 1 additional minute per day.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.

extra_martial_flexibility.name: Extra Martial Flexibility
description: ## Extra Martial Flexibility
{SOURCE Advanced Class Guide/147}
You are extremely versatile in a fight.
**Prerequisites:** Martial flexibility class feature.
**Benefit:** You can use your martial flexibility ability three additional times per day.

extra_mental_focus.name: Extra Mental Focus
description: ## Extra Mental Focus
{SOURCE Occult Adventures/133}
You possess increased mental focus.
**Prerequisites:** Mental focus class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain 2 additional points of mental focus.

extra_mercy.name: Extra Mercy
description: ## Extra Mercy
{SOURCE PRPG Core Rulebook/124}
Your lay on hands ability adds an additional mercy.
**Prerequisites:** {ability/Lay on hands} class feature, mercy class feature.
**Benefit:** Select one additional {ability/merc/y>ies} for which you qualify. When you use lay on hands to heal damage to one target, it also receives the additional effects of this mercy.
**Special:** You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take this feat, select a new mercy.

extra_mesmerist_tricks.name: Extra Mesmerist Tricks
description: ## Extra Mesmerist Tricks
{SOURCE Occult Adventures/133}
You can use your mesmerist tricks more often.
**Prerequisites:** Mesmerist trick class feature.
**Benefit:** You can implant two additional mesmerist {ability/tricks} per day.
**Special:** You can gain Extra Mesmerist Tricks multiple times. Its effects stack.

extra_mythic_power.name: Extra Mythic Power
description: ## Extra Mythic Power (Mythic)
{SOURCE Mythic Adventures/65}
You can store more mythic power than your tier would normally allow.
**Benefit:** You gain two extra uses of mythic power each day.

extra_ninja_trick.name: Extra Ninja Trick
description: ## Extra Ninja Trick
{SOURCE Blood of Shadows/25}
You have honed your shadowy skills further than most.
**Prerequisites:** Ninja trick class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain one additional {ability/ninja trick>s}. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this ninja trick.
**Special:** You can gain Extra Ninja Trick multiple times.

extra_panache.name: Extra Panache
description: ## Extra Panache (Panache)
{SOURCE Advanced Class Guide/147}
You have more panache than the ordinary swashbuckler.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Amateur Swashbuckler} or panache class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain two more panache points at the start of each day, and your maximum panache increases by two.
**Special:** If you have levels in the {class/swashbuckler} class, you can take this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.

extra_path_ability.name: Extra Path Ability
description: ## Extra Path Ability (Mythic)
{SOURCE Mythic Adventures/65}
You can call upon mythic powers beyond those already invested in you.
**Prerequisites:** 3rd mythic tier.
**Benefit:** Choose one mythic ability from your path or from the universal path abilities that you meet the requirements for. You gain that path ability.

extra_performance.name: Extra Performance
description: ## Extra Performance
{SOURCE PRPG Core Rulebook/124}
You can use your bardic performance ability more often than normal.
**Prerequisites:** {ability/Bardic performance} class feature.
**Benefit:** You can use bardic performance for 6 additional rounds per day.
**Special:** You can gain Extra Performance multiple times. Its effects stack.

extra_rage.name: Extra Rage
description: ## Extra Rage
{SOURCE PRPG Core Rulebook/124}
You can use your rage ability more than normal.
**Prerequisites:** Rage class feature.
**Benefit:** You can rage for 6 additional rounds per day.
**Special:** You can gain Extra Rage multiple times. Its effects stack.

extra_rage_power.name: Extra Rage Power
description: ## Extra Rage Power
{SOURCE Advanced Player's Guide/160}
You have unlocked a new ability to use while raging.
**Prerequisites:** Rage power class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain one additional {ability/rage power>s}. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this rage power.
**Special:** You can gain Extra Rage Power multiple times.

extra_ranger_trap.name: Extra Ranger Trap
description: ## Extra Ranger Trap
{SOURCE Ultimate Magic/150}
You can use ranger traps more often.
**Prerequisites:** Trap class feature.
**Benefit:** You can set {ability/ranger traps} two additional times per day.

extra_reservoir.name: Extra Reservoir
description: ## Extra Reservoir
{SOURCE Advanced Class Guide/147}
Your reservoir of arcane energy is greater than others'.
**Prerequisites:** Arcane reservoir class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain three more points in your arcane reservoir, and the maximum number of points in your arcane reservoir increases by that amount.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Its effects stack.

extra_revelation.name: Extra Revelation
description: ## Extra Revelation
{SOURCE Advanced Player's Guide/160}
You have discovered a new aspect of your mystery.
**Prerequisites:** Revelation class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain one additional revelation. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this revelation.
**Special:** You can gain Extra Revelation multiple times.

extra_rogue_talent.name: Extra Rogue Talent
description: ## Extra Rogue Talent
{SOURCE Advanced Player's Guide/160}
Through constant practice, you have learned how to perform a special trick.
**Prerequisites:** Rogue talent class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain one additional {ability/rogue talent>s}. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this rogue talent.
**Special:** You can gain Extra Rogue Talent multiple times.

extra_shadow_jump.name: Extra Shadow Jump
description: ## Extra Shadow Jump
{SOURCE Blood of Shadows/25}
You have an improved ability to leap through shadow.
**Prerequisites:** Shadow jump {pclass/shadowdancer} class feature.

**Benefit:** Add 10 feet to the total distance you can jump each day using the shadow jump ability. The extra distance provided by this feat doubles whenever the distance that you can jump doubles (20 feet at 6th, 40 feet at 8th, and 80 feet at 10th level).
**Special:** This feat can be selected up to four times. Its effects stack.

extra_slayer_talent.name: Extra Slayer Talent
description: ## Extra Slayer Talent
{SOURCE Advanced Class Guide/147}
Through long practice, you have learned how to perform a special talent.
**Prerequisites:** Slayer talent class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain one additional {ability/slayer talent>s}. You must meet the prerequisites for this slayer talent.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another slayer talent.

extra_spell_synthesis.name: Extra Spell Synthesis
description: ## Extra Spell Synthesis
{SOURCE Chronicle of Legends/9}
You push your combination of magic to greater heights.
**Prerequisites:** Spell synthesis class feature.
**Benefit:** You can perform one additional spell synthesis per day.
**Special:** You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you take the feat, you can use this ability one additional time per day.

extra_spontaneous_spell_mastery.name: Extra Spontaneous Spell Mastery
description: ## Extra Spontaneous Spell Mastery
{SOURCE Adventurer's Guide/124;Arcane Anthology/14}
You are able to spontaneously cast spells you have mastered more frequently than your peers.
**Prerequisites:** {pclass/Magaambyan arcanist} spontaneous spell mastery class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain one additional use of your spontaneous spell mastery ability per day.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times.

extra_stamina.name: Extra Stamina
description: ## Extra Stamina (Combat)
{SOURCE Pathfinder Unchained/113}
You can push yourself to higher limits.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Combat Stamina}, base attack bonus +5.
**Benefit:** Your stamina pool increases by 3 points.
**Special:** You can select this feat up to three times. Each time you do, your stamina pool grows by 3 points.

extra_summons.name: Extra Summons
description: ## Extra Summons
{SOURCE Ultimate Magic/150}
You can summon monsters more often each day.
**Prerequisites:** Ability to cast {spell/summon monster>_1} as a spell-like ability, {class/summoner} 1st.
**Benefit:** You gain 1 additional use of your summon monster spell-like ability per day.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times, but it can only be taken once for every five summoner levels you possess.

extra_surge.name: Extra Surge
description: ## Extra Surge
{SOURCE Pathfinder #85: Fires of Creation/72;People of the Stars/7}
You can use your nanite surge ability more often than normal.
**Prerequisites:** Con 13, nanite surge ability.
**Benefit:** You can use your nanite surge ability one additional time per day.
**Special:** You can gain Extra Surge multiple times. Its effects stack.

extra_touch_treatment.name: Extra Touch Treatment
description: ## Extra Touch Treatment
{SOURCE Occult Adventures/133}
You can use your touch treatment more often.
**Prerequisites:** Touch treatment class feature.
**Benefit:** You can use touch treatment two additional times per day.

extra_variance.name: Extra Variance
description: ## Extra Variance
{SOURCE Magic Tactics Toolbox/9}
You can augment your channeled energy in new ways.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Channeling Variance} or {ability/variant channeling} ability, {ability/channel energy} class feature.

**Benefit:** You gain one additional variant channeling ability that matches one of your deity's domains, subdomains, or areas of concern. Three times per day, you can apply the modifications of this variant channel energy, reducing the damage dealt or healing performed by your channeled energy as normal. You cannot apply more than one variant channeling ability to your channeled energy at once.

**Special:** You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you gain another variant channeling ability. If you have chosen Channeling Variance twice, you can use any variant channeling ability chosen with this feat whenever you channel energy.

extra_vested_power.name: Extra Vested Power
description: ## Extra Vested Power
{SOURCE Heroes of the High Court/23}
You have been invested with additional powers to guide your destiny.
**Prerequisites:** Vested power class feature.
**Benefit:** You gain an additional vested power. You must meet the level requirement for this vested power.
**Special:** You can take Extra Vested Power multiple times.

extra_wild_talent.name: Extra Wild Talent
description: ## Extra Wild Talent
{SOURCE Occult Adventures/133}
You gain an additional wild talent.
**Prerequisites:** {class/Kineticist} level 6th.

**Benefit:** You gain a wild talent that's at least 2 levels lower than the highest-level wild talent you can currently use. You can select an infusion or a non-infusion wild talent, but not a blast or defense wild talent. If you have the expanded element class feature, you can select a wild talent from any of your elements that's at least 2 levels lower than the highest-level wild talent from your primary element that you can currently use.
**Special:** You can take this feat multiple times. Each time, you must choose a different wild talent.

extra_word.name: Extra Word
description: ## Extra Word (Words of Power)
{SOURCE Ultimate Magic/166}
You have uncovered a new word of power.
**Prerequisites:** Caster level 1st, ability to cast {rule/words/pells>_of_power}, see Special.

**Benefit:** Add one effect word from your class's word list to your list of words known. This is in addition to the number of words normally gained at each level in your class. You may instead add two words from your class's word list to your list of words known, but both of these words must be at least one level lower than the highest-level wordspell you can cast in that class. Once made, these choices cannot be changed.

**Special:** You can only take this feat if you possess levels in a class whose spellcasting relies on a limited list of words known, such as the bard, oracle, or sorcerer. You can take this feat multiple times.

extraplanar_conjunction.name: Extraplanar Conjunction
description: ## Extraplanar Conjunction (Teamwork)
{SOURCE Inner Sea Races/206}
The innate planar energies of your allies empower your magical abilities, allowing you to make your spell-like abilities more difficult to resist.
**Prerequisites:** Any racial spell-like ability, {type/outsider}.

**Benefit:** Whenever you're adjacent to an outsider ally who also has this feat, the DC of any racial spell-like abilities you use increases by 2 if your ally has the same racial spell-like ability. The proximity of multiple allies can't increase the DC further.

extreme_mood_swings.name: Extreme Mood Swings
description: ## Extreme Mood Swings
{SOURCE Inner Sea Taverns/59}
Your emotions sometimes get the better of you.

**Benefit:** Increase each morale bonus you receive by 1. You take a -1 penalty on saves against emotion and fear effects. When you are {rule/drunk>enness} (or worse), this penalty doubles, but you increase each morale bonus you receive by 2 instead.

extreme_prejudice.name: Extreme Prejudice
description: ## Extreme Prejudice (Combat)
{SOURCE Advanced Class Guide/147}
Your hatred of a particular type of creature has honed your killer instinct.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Seething Hatred}, {ability/sneak attack} +3d6, studied target class feature.
**Benefit:** When you succeed at a sneak attack against a creature you selected as the target of your Seething Hatred feat, you use d8s to roll sneak attack damage instead of d6s.
>**Combat Trick** (from the {feat/Combat Stamina} feat)
>{SOURCE Pathfinder Unchained/119}

>When you succeed at a sneak attack against a creature that is not the target of your Seething Hatred feat, you can spend 5 stamina points to treat the creature as if it were the target of your Seething Hatred for that attack.

eye_for_ingredients.name: Eye for Ingredients
description: ## Eye for Ingredients
{SOURCE Ultimate Intrigue/82}
Your keen eyes help you find better deals on magical components for your spells.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Eschew Materials}, Appraise 6 ranks, Spellcraft 6 ranks.

**Benefit:** When in a large city or larger settlement, you can search the markets carefully for 4 hours in order to purchase material components for your spells at a 10% discount. You can purchase up to 1,000 gp worth of material components (which costs you 900 gp) each day. These cheaper components work perfectly well for their spells, but their resale value is also 10% less.

eye_of_the_arclord.name: Eye of the Arclord
description: ## Eye of the Arclord
{SOURCE Inner Sea World Guide/286;Pathfinder Campaign Setting/109}
Your understanding of the esoteric teachings of the Arclords of Nex allows you to open an eldritch eye that grants you superior perception of the magical world.
**Prerequisites:** Knowledge (arcana) 4 ranks, ability to cast arcane spells.

**Benefit:** Once per day as a standard action, you can open an incandescent third eye upon your forehead. The eye can remain open for 1 minute, during which time you cast all divination spells at +1 caster level (as long as you begin casting the spell before the eye closes), gain darkvision 60 feet, and can use {spell/detect magic} (as the spell of the same name). You gain a +8 bonus on {skill/Perception} checks to notice invisible creatures while the eye is open as well.

eyes_of_judgment.name: Eyes of Judgment
description: ## Eyes of Judgment
{SOURCE Ultimate Magic/150}
The true motives of creatures cannot escape your discerning gaze.
**Prerequisites:** Detect alignment class feature, caster level 6th.

**Benefit:** When using your detect alignment class feature, you may spend 3 rounds studying a creature within 60 feet. You cannot take any other actions while doing this. After that time has passed, you learn the alignment of the creature.

eyes_of_the_purge.name: Eyes of the Purge
description: ## Eyes of the Purge
{SOURCE Pathfinder #132: The Six-Legend Soul/73}
Through training and persistence inspired by the Great Purge of Stavian I, you have learned to detect the sources of divine magic in such effects' auras.
**Prerequisites:** Ability to cast {spell/detect magic} as a spell or spell-like ability.

**Benefit:** When you use {spell/detect magic} to determine the strength and location of the aura of a functioning spell, if that spell's caster used a holy symbol as a divine focus to cast the spell, you see a ghostly image of the deity's holy symbol as part of the spell's aura. Effects that block divination spells or effects also block the effects of this feat.

eyes_of_the_twilight.name: Eyes of the Twilight
description: ## Eyes of the Twilight
{SOURCE Inner Sea Races/206}
Your eyes have grown accustomed to the half-light of dusk and dawn.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Sharp Senses}, Perception 7 ranks, keen senses racial trait, low-light vision.
**Benefit:** Creatures within an area of dim light don't gain {rule/concealment} from you. You're still effectively {misc/blinded} in an area of darkness.
**Normal:** Creatures within an area of dim light gain concealment (20% miss chance in combat) from those without darkvision or the ability to see in darkness.

fabulist.name: Fabulist
description: ## Fabulist (Grit)
{SOURCE Champions of Balance/19}
You enjoy telling tall tales and gain confidence when others believe them.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Amateur Gunslinger} feat or grit class feature.

**Benefit:** You gain a +1 bonus on Perform (act, comedy, oratory, and sing) skill checks, and Perform is a class skill for you. In addition, each time you make a successful {skill/Bluff} check to convince someone of a far-fetched or impossible story, you regain 1 grit point. Successfully lying to a friendly or helpful creature, or a creature that has fewer Hit Dice than half your character level, doesn't restore grit.

fabulous_figments.name: Fabulous Figments
description: ## Fabulous Figments (Mythic)
{SOURCE Mythic Adventures/65}
Your illusions are astonishingly realistic.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Spell Focus} (illusion).

**Benefit:** Non-mythic creatures can't identify your illusion spells with Spellcraft, including checks attempted as part of arcane sight, detect magic, or similar effects. When mythic creatures attempt to identify your illusions, add your tier to the DC of those Spellcraft checks. Mythic creatures informed by their allies that one of your illusions isn't real gain only a +2 bonus on their Will saves to disbelieve. Non-mythic creatures gain no bonus to disbelieve.

faeries_strike.name: Faerie's Strike
description: ## Faerie's Strike (Combat)
{SOURCE Advanced Class Guide/147}
Ephemeral wisps of nature spirits dance about those you strike.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Nature Magic} or the ability to cast druid or ranger spells; {feat/Vital Strike}, Knowledge (nature) 5 ranks.

**Benefit:** When you use Vital Strike (or {feat/Improved Vital Strike} or {feat/Greater Vital Strike}), the creature you hit with the attack must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Wisdom modifier) or be illuminated as if by {spell/faerie fire} for 1 minute. You can use this benefit a number of times per day equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1).
>**Combat Trick** (from the {feat/Combat Stamina} feat)
>{SOURCE Pathfinder Unchained/119}
>When using this feat, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to increase the DC of the effect by an amount equal to the number of stamina points you spent.

falcons_cry.name: Falcon's Cry
description: ## Falcon's Cry
{SOURCE Adventurer's Guide/76;Andoran, Birthplace of Freedom/30}
You inspire others to throw off the shackles of oppression.
**Prerequisites:** Cha 13, affiliated with the Steel Falcons.

**Benefit:** You inspire a zeal for freedom in your allies. As a standard action, you can grant everyone within 60 feet who is able to see and hear you the ability to roll twice when attempting an Escape Artist check, a Will save against compulsions, or a Strength check to break chains, manacles, or similar bonds. Such checks must be attempted before the beginning of your next turn. You can do this once per day, plus one additional time for every 3 character levels that you have.

fall_guy.name: Fall Guy
description: ## Fall Guy (Teamwork)
{SOURCE Antihero's Handbook/10}
Your ally plays the part of a bumbling fool, making you look good in comparison.
**Prerequisites:** Bluff 1 rank.

**Benefit:** An ally who also has this feat can spend a standard action bumbling around, uttering gaffes, or otherwise making herself appear to be socially inept. The ally takes a -2 penalty on future Charisma-based checks against characters who witnessed her behavior, but you gain a +2 competence bonus on such checks. The penalty and bonus both end after 24 hours.

falling_water_gambit.name: Falling Water Gambit
description: ## Falling Water Gambit (Combat)
{SOURCE Adventurer's Guide/25;Inner Sea Combat/10}
You have integrated both the Roaring Falls and Shrouded Lake techniques of Aldori swordplay into a seamless union.

**Prerequisites:** {feat/Aldori Dueling Disciple}, {feat/Duelist of the Roaring Falls}, {feat/Duelist of the Shrouded Lake}, {feat/Exotic Weapon Proficiency} (Aldori dueling sword), {feat/Weapon Finesse}, {feat/Weapon Focus} (Aldori dueling sword), base attack bonus +8.

**Benefit:** When attacking a creature denied its Dexterity bonus to AC because of your successful feint, you increase the threat range of your {eq-weapon/Aldori dueling sword} by 1 (typically to 18-20/×2), and gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls to confirm critical hits. After you make a {rule/dueling dodge} or succeed at a {rule/dueling parry} during a duel, you can make an attack of opportunity against the foe who attacked you if that foe is {misc/shaken}, {misc/frightened}, or {misc/panicked}. To gain these benefits, you must be wielding only an Aldori dueling sword (not using a shield, an off-hand weapon, armor spikes, unarmed strikes, or natural weapons).
>**Combat Trick** (from the {feat/Combat Stamina} feat)
>{SOURCE Weapon Master's Handbook/25}

>By spending 4 stamina points, you gain the ability to attempt a dueling dodge or a dueling parry against attacks made by a shaken, frightened, or panicked opponent, even if you aren't participating in a duel.

false_casting.name: False Casting
description: ## False Casting
{SOURCE Inner Sea Magic/10}
When using a magic item, you can trick onlookers into thinking you used spellcasting instead.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Magical Aptitude}, Bluff 1 rank, Sleight of Hand 1 rank.

**Benefit:** When you use a magic item or a spell-like ability to create a magical effect, you may add additional magic-seeming words and hand gestures to trick onlookers into believing you cast the spell yourself. If using an item that is recognizable as a magical implement (such as a wand or ring), you can trick viewers into thinking you are just using the item as a focus component. Onlookers who have no ranks in Spellcraft have no knowledge of what is genuine spellcasting, and automatically believe you are casting a spell.

If an onlooker attempts a Spellcraft check to identify your "casting," his check is opposed by your Bluff check. If he succeeds, he realizes the deception. If he fails, he believes you cast the spell. Regardless of the result of that opposed check, he uses the result of that Spellcraft check to identify the "spell" you cast, except the DC is 20 + the spell's level instead of 15 + the spell's level.

false_focus.name: False Focus
description: ## False Focus
{SOURCE Inner Sea Magic/10}
You can use a divine focus to cast arcane spells.
**Prerequisites:** Knowledge (religion) 1 rank, ability to cast arcane spells.

**Benefit:** By using a divine focus as part of casting, you can cast any spell with a material component costing the value of that divine focus (maximum 100 gp) or less without needing that component. For example, if you use a silver holy symbol worth 25 gp, you do not have to provide material components for an arcane spell if its components are worth 25 gp or less. The casting of the spell still provokes attacks of opportunity as normal. If the spell requires a material component that costs more than the value of the divine focus, you must have the material component on hand to cast the spell, as normal.
**Normal:** A divine focus has no effect when used as a component in arcane spells.

false_opening.name: False Opening
description: ## False Opening (Combat)
{SOURCE Ultimate Combat/100}
When you make a ranged attack while threatened, you can fool your opponent into thinking he has an opening.
**Prerequisites:** Dex 13, {feat/Dodge}, {feat/Close Quarters Thrower} or {feat/Point-Blank Master}, {feat/Weapon Focus} with selected ranged weapon.

**Benefit:** Choose a ranged weapon or a thrown weapon. When you make a ranged attack using that weapon, you can choose to provoke an attack of opportunity from one or more opponents who threaten you. You gain a +4 dodge bonus against such attacks. An opponent that makes such an attack and misses you loses his Dexterity bonus to AC against you until the end of your turn.
>**Combat Trick** (from the {feat/Combat Stamina} feat)
>{SOURCE Pathfinder Unchained/119}

>When you use this feat, you can spend 5 stamina points to make an attack of opportunity against an opponent who misses you with the provoked attack (after it loses its Dexterity bonus to AC against you).

false_trail.name: False Trail
description: ## False Trail
{SOURCE Ultimate Wilderness/111}
You create a false trail to throw off pursuers, enabling you to increase your lead on those following you or make them lose your trail entirely.
**Prerequisites:** Survival 3 ranks.

**Benefit:** You can create a false trail in the wilderness via a combination of misleading footprints, discarded items, torn scraps of clothing, and other signs. When you create a false trail, you determine the direction it leads. A creature tracking you must succeed at a Perception or Survival check (DC = 10 + half your character level + your Wisdom modifier) to determine the trail is fake when first encountering it. On a success, the creature can continue to track you as normal. The effect of a failure to identify the trail as false depends on the time and effort spent making it.
>@HL[Quick:] A quick false trail takes 10 minutes to complete. A creature that fails to identify the trail as false follows it for 1d4×1,000 feet.
>@HL[Normal:] A normal false trail takes 1 hour to complete. A creature that fails to identify the trail as false follows it for 1d4 miles.
>@HL[Elaborate:] An elaborate false trail takes 4 hours to complete. A creature that fails to identify the trail as false follows it for 2d6 miles.

After a creature that fails to identify a false trail follows it for the determined distance, it can attempt another Perception or Survival check with a +5 bonus. On a success, the creature realizes it's following a false trail and can continue to track you as normal after backtracking to the start of the false trail (or wherever you diverged from the false trail). On a failure, the creature continues to move in the direction of the false trail for an additional mile. After each mile, it can attempt a new check with a cumulative +5 bonus.

falter.name: Falter
description: ## Falter (Blood Hex)
{SOURCE Magic Tactics Toolbox/29}
You curse the blood of your foes, forcing them to falter in their subsequent actions.
**Prerequisites:** Int 13, Spellcraft 5 ranks, Use Magic Device 5 ranks.

**Benefit:** As a standard action, you can curse an enemy you've dealt damage to since your last turn. That target must succeed at a Will save or be unable to take a 5-foot step, {rule/delay} an action, or {rule/ready an action} for 1 round.

**Special:** A shaman or witch with this [blood hex](rule/feats_class) can use it against any creature she has dealt damage to in the past minute. A creature affected by this blood hex used by a shaman or witch also has its movement rate halved for the blood hex's duration.

familiar_bond.name: Familiar Bond
description: ## Familiar Bond
{SOURCE Familiar Folio/18}
You have learned a ritual that allows you to gain a familiar.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Iron Will}.

**Benefit:** You gain a {ability/familiar}, as the wizard arcane bond class feature. You do not gain the special ability the familiar normally grants its master, and the {sidekick/familiar} does not gain the deliver touch spells, scry on familiar, share spells, speak with animals of its kind, or spell resistance special abilities. Otherwise, your total Hit Dice are used as your wizard level for determining the familiar's abilities.

**Special:** If you have (or later gain) levels in a class that grants a familiar, whenever you select a familiar, you can either base your familiar's abilities on your total Hit Dice per this feat (including the restrictions on its special abilities), or choose to apply only your levels in classes that grant a familiar (and thus gain all the special abilities that familiar would grant based on those class levels). You can never have more than one familiar.

familiar_focus.name: Familiar Focus
description: ## Familiar Focus
{SOURCE Animal Archive/18}
You are closely connected to your master's powers.
**Prerequisites:** {sidekick/Familiar}.
**Benefit:** Whenever your master targets you with a harmless spell or spell-like ability, your master's effective caster level for the effect is increased by 1.

familiar_link.name: Familiar Link
description: ## Familiar Link (Coven, Teamwork)
{SOURCE Blood of the Coven/13}
Within your coven, you have formed a bond with your fellow witches' familiars.
**Prerequisites:** {hex/Coven} hex or {feat/Coven-Touched}, familiar or spirit animal class feature, {class/witch} level 1st.

**Benefit:** You share an empathic link with the familiars of all other witches in your coven who also have this feat, as per the witch's familiar ability. Additionally, you can use the share spells, deliver touch spells, and scry on familiar abilities with a coven member's familiar as the target, as long as your witch level is high enough to grant access to these abilities. You can communicate with the familiar using its speak with master ability. You gain a +5 bonus on Spellcraft checks to help your familiar learn spells from a coven member's familiar.

familiar_spell.name: Familiar Spell
description: ## Familiar Spell (Metamagic)
{SOURCE Animal Archive/18}
You can imbue your familiar with a spell.
**Prerequisites:** Spellcaster with {ability/familiar} class feature.

**Benefit:** You can transfer a prepared spell to your familiar, allowing the familiar to cast that spell at a later time. Variables that rely on caster level function according to your caster level, not your familiar's Hit Dice, though your familiar's Intelligence may influence how precisely it can follow your instructions on how to use these spells.

Your familiar must be able to speak to cast spells with a verbal component (the ability to speak with its master or creatures of its kind is insufficient). Your familiar must be carrying any material or focus components necessary, unless the materials cost less than 1 gp and the spell is prepared with {feat/Eschew Materials}. Attack rolls use your familiar's ability scores. A familiar spell counts against the number of spells you may prepare for as long as your familiar retains the spell. Once your familiar casts a retained spell, you can prepare a new spell in that slot the next time you prepare spells.

A familiar spell uses up a spell slot 3 levels higher than the spell's actual level. Your familiar can store a number of spell levels (including this modifier) equal to your caster level, but no spell's adjusted level can exceed half your caster level.
**Special:** If you are a spontaneous caster, you must select a specific spell with which to imbue your familiar; you cannot imbue your familiar with an open spell slot.

famine_tolerance.name: Famine Tolerance
description: ## Famine Tolerance
{SOURCE Blood of the Night/28}
You can abide much longer periods without feeding, and enjoy increased benefits from a meal.
**Prerequisites:** [Moroi or nosferatu](template/vampire).

**Benefit:** You can go without feeding for a number of days equal to twice your Hit Dice before having to make hunger saves. When you use your blood drain ability, you gain twice the normal amount of temporary hit points for each feeding.
**Special:** This feat is only for campaigns using {rule/the[ optional undead] hunger} rules.

fan_bearer_at_the_kings_right_hand.name: Fan-Bearer at the King's Right Hand
description: ## Fan-Bearer at the King's Right Hand (Origin)
{SOURCE Pathfinder #139: The Dead Road/73}
Your creator was an aide and bodyguard, and your memories are filled with the sight of that charge.
**Prerequisites:** {race/Shabti}.

**Benefit:** As a swift action, you can designate an adjacent ally as your charge. So long as you remain adjacent to that character, he benefits from your resistance to level drain and immunity to undeath racial traits. This ability applies even if one of you is killed, so long as you remain adjacent.

fanged_crown_massacre.name: Fanged Crown Massacre
description: ## Fanged Crown Massacre
{SOURCE Adventurer's Guide/84}
Driven by your loyalty to a fallen queen, you can inspire your allies to brutal acts.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Bodyguard}, {feat/Combat Reflexes}, Perform (oratory) 3 ranks, any evil alignment.

**Benefit:** Whenever an ally within 30 feet makes an attack, you can attempt a DC 10 Perform (oratory) check as an immediate action. If you are successful, the ally gains a +2 morale bonus on her attack roll. If an attack affected in this way would normally deal nonlethal damage, it deals lethal damage instead. This ability has no effect if your ally cannot hear you speak or understand your words.

far_shot.name: Far Shot
description: ## Far Shot (Combat)
{SOURCE PRPG Core Rulebook/124}
You are more accurate at longer ranges.
**Prerequisites:** {feat/Point-Blank Shot}.
**Benefit:** You only suffer a -1 penalty per full range increment between you and your target when using a ranged weapon.
**Normal:** You suffer a -2 penalty per full range increment between you and your target.
>**Combat Trick** (from the {feat/Combat Stamina} feat)
>{SOURCE Pathfinder Unchained/119}
>When making a single ranged attack as a standard action, you can spend 5 stamina points to ignore all range penalties on that attack.
### Mythic Far Shot
{SOURCE Mythic Adventures/65}
You make long-ranged attacks with remarkable accuracy.
**Prerequisites:** Far Shot.
**Benefit:** As a swift action, you can expend one use of mythic power to ignore all range increment penalties for your ranged attacks until the end of your turn.

far_roaming_familiar.name: Far-Roaming Familiar
description: ## Far-Roaming Familiar
{SOURCE Familiar Folio/18}
Distance can't sever the bond between you and your familiar.
**Prerequisites:** Intelligence 13, must have a {ability/familiar}.

**Benefit:** You retain your empathic link to your familiar regardless of distance, though lead blocks the link at distances greater than 1 mile (similar to the way lead blocks {spell/detect magic} effects).

fascinated_by_the_mundane.name: Fascinated by the Mundane
description: ## Fascinated by the Mundane (Story)
{SOURCE Legacy of the First World/5}

Your perspective of normality is slightly skewed, and you are easily awed by things such as commonplace tools or mundane activities. You struggle to find your place in a world that seems continually poised to overwhelm your senses.

**Prerequisites:** You must have a fey ancestor somewhere in your family line, and you must have the [Adopted by the Fey, Met a Fantastic Creature](rule/birth_circumstances_and_more), or [Fey Meeting](rule/class_background_tables) background.
**Benefit:** You gain a +2 bonus on Charisma-based ability checks and skill checks other than Diplomacy checks.
**Goal:** You must succeed at your saving throws against five different spells with the emotion descriptor or attempts to apply the fascinated condition to you.
**Special:** Your ever-present awe is under your control. Your bonus on Charisma-based skill checks now also applies on your Diplomacy checks. You can increase any morale bonus you receive by 1.

fascination_jinx.name: Fascination Jinx
description: ## Fascination Jinx
{SOURCE Halflings of Golarion/27}
If you jinx an already fascinated creature, it doesn't fully recover until the jinx ends.
**Prerequisites:** {ability/Bardic performance} class feature, Halfling Jinx trait.

**Benefit:** If you jinx a creature under the effect of a bard's {performance/fascinate} ability, it also takes a -10 penalty on initiative checks while affected by the jinx. A creature under the effect of your fascinate ability has a -2 penalty on its save against your jinx.

fast_change.name: Fast Change
description: ## Fast Change
{SOURCE Blood of the Moon/7}
You can change forms faster than most skinwalkers.
**Prerequisites:** Dex 13, base attack bonus +6, {race/skinwalker}.
**Benefit:** You can assume your bestial form as a move action instead of a standard action.

fast_crawl.name: Fast Crawl
description: ## Fast Crawl
{SOURCE Faction Guide/56}
You are skilled at moving while prone.

**Benefit:** While {rule/prone}, you can move at half speed. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity as normal. You can take a 5-foot step while crawling. This benefit does not stack with the {talent/rogue crawl} talent.
**Normal:** You can crawl 5 feet as a move action. You cannot take a 5-foot step while crawling.

fast_drinker.name: Fast Drinker
description: ## Fast Drinker
{SOURCE Advanced Player's Guide/160}
You swiftly guzzle spirits to draw forth ki.
**Prerequisites:** Con 18, drunken ki class feature.
